newsitem.title: USA: Ameri-Credit names new president. [CORRECTED 22:22 GMT]
newsitem.headline: Ameri-Credit names new president. [CORRECTED 22:22 GMT]

text.p: (Corrects the headline and text to make clear that the new president already held the title of CFO).
AmeriCredit Corp said Monday it has named Michael Barrington president.
The company said the appointments are related to its acquisition of Rancho Vista Mortgage Corp for 400,000 shares of its common stock.
Rancho Vista Chief Executive Douglas McCracken and President Michael Hughes are to remain in those positions at Rancho Vista, which will operated as a wholly-owned subsidiary of AmeriCredit.
A company spokesman was not immediately available to provide information on the backgrounds of Barrington and Berce, or to provide other details on the move.
